thread.title: CSG Government Solutions Sponsors the 48th Annual IT Solutions Management Conference
thread.title_full: CSG Government Solutions Sponsors the 48th Annual IT Solutions Management Conference - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: CSG Government Solutions Sponsors the 48th Annual IT Solutions Management Conference
text:
CSG Government Solutions, a national leader in government program modernization, recently sponsored and exhibited at the 48th Annual IT Solutions Management (ISM) for Human Services Conference held August 30 to September 2 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
Chicago, Illinois
CSG Government Solutions , a national leader in government program modernization, recently sponsored and exhibited at the 48th Annual IT Solutions Management (ISM) for Human Services Conference held August 30 to September 2 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
ISM, an affiliate of the American Public Human Services Association, brings together federal, state, local, and private sector health and human services thought leaders to discuss lessons learned, emerging issues, and key industry trends. This year’s conference sessions focused on consumer engagement, federal guidance, collaboration, data driven decisions, and workforce optimization.
“The ISM Conference provides a forum to discuss the latest IT advancements and business solutions to help health and human services administrators meet the challenges of agency transformation,” says Deneen Omer, Director of CSG’s Human Services practice . “CSG appreciates the opportunity to participate as a sponsor and exhibitor for the sixth consecutive year.”
CSG Government Solutions continues to increase its presence across the United States. The company deploys highly experienced teams and innovative methods, knowledge, and tools to help governments modernize complex program enterprises. CSG clients include 42 state governments, the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services, the U.S. Department of Labor, and large municipal governments.
CONTACT:

ABOUT CSG GOVERNMENT SOLUTIONS:
CSG Government Solutions is a leading government operations consulting firm focused on helping states modernize critical program enterprises. Our highly experienced teams and industry-leading Centers of Excellence help governments leverage innovative technology and processes to meet the challenges of administering complex programs. Founded in 1997, CSG has established itself as a trusted adviser to government agencies across the U.S.
